K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-1: shr'i mah'a mudr'a ti la kam n'a ma mah'a yo g'i ni tantra r'a dza aa dhi ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-3: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-4: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-5: bcom ldan mkha' 'gro ye shes nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-6: gsang par snying po'i kha 'byed pa; ;gsang pad lte ba'i nang na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-7: bdag gi zhu ba khyod gson cig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-9: 'bum lnga yi ni bdag nyid rgyud //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-11: sbyor drug rnal 'byor ma yi gzhung //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-23: gang na nub pa'i dus dang rtsa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-24: mchog gi dbang phyug du tsam mchis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-25: dus kyi mtshan nyid gang lags gsungs; ;de yi dus kyis don ci byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-26: a'a li k'a li bya ba gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-27: mnga' bdag gang nas 'byung ba lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-28: ro yi bye brag du zhig bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:433b-29: dga' ba yang ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-2: rdo rje dbang phyug 'byung ba gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-3: chos kyi dbyings ni ji ltar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-4: rdo rje yang ni ji ltar bstan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-6: gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-7: mchog ces bgyi ba ji ltar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-8: dgyes pa'i don ni gsal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-9: rigs kyi bye brag du tsam bstan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-13: gang nas skyes shing gang du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-14: chen bo'i chen po de ji ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-15: phyag rgya'i bye brag du zhig bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-16: phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-17: mgon po mchod pa'i bye brag ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-18: de ru me tog ji ltar yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-19: mgon po chen po mchod sbyin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-20: ji lta bu zhig 'tshal ba lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-21: mchog gi dngos po'i dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-22: bcom ldan 'das de ci lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-23: de ru lha mo ci 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-24: lha mo bgyi ba gang lags gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-25: bcom ldan dur khrod du zhig mchis; ;de ru shing ni ji ltar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-26: dur khrod dang ni shing rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-27: rgyal ba'i dbang phyug de gnas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-28: mgon po nang gi sbyin sreg dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-29: bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-31: de ru skad ni ci lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-32: bdag nyid kyi ni rang ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-33: mgon po chen po khyod kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434a-34: dpal phyag rgya chen po thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-0: rgyud thams @434b cad kyi rgyu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-5: mchog las mchog gi yang dag mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-7: bzang mo de ru byol song yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-8: don dam de ni khyod gcig pu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-9: zhal bzang mo yi snod yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-10: gsang ba'i gsang ba yang dag rab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-11: nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-12: dang po re zhig slob ma la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-15: nges par snod du gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-16: dbang med na ni dngos grub med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-17: bye ma btsir yang mar med ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-18: gang zhig rgyud lung nga rgyal gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-19: dbang bskur med la gsal byed pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-22: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-24: dbang bskur yod dang de nyid shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-25: ye shes shes dang thugs rje che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-27: ser sna med dang rang bzhin bzang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-29: phrag dog yul ni rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-30: rtag tu dga' ba'i yid ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-31: 'dod chags chen po gcig pu'i yid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:434b-32: sdom pa de ni shes pa na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-0: de lta bu yi bla ma @435a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-1: yis; ;'bad pas slob ma brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-2: ji ltar bsregs la sogs pas gser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-3: ji ltar mkhas pas rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-4: ji ltar bde ldan bu mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-5: de ltar slob ma brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-6: de bas thams cad rab 'bad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-7: phan tshun so sor brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-8: de ltar min na skyon du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-9: nam yang dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-10: ji ltar dug la rab sngags kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-11: dag pa byas nas bdud rtsir 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-12: de bzhin slob ma dbang sogs kyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-17: dpal ni bla ma me 'drar blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-18: bla ma ston pa bas lhag blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-19: yid bzhin rin chen mnyam par blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-20: ji ltar rab sbyer dang sngags kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-21: sprul gyi rgyal po'i spyi bo las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-22: tshad med pa yi rin chen rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-23: dbul ba thams cad med par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-24: rab sbyor log dang sngags log gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-25: dga' mo nges par tshig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-26: de lta bu yi cho ga yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-28: dpa' zhal de nyid rin dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-30: de ltar min te ma gus na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-31: gsung gi me yis nges tshig byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-32: ji ltar me yis shing tshig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-33: skad cig gis ni thal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435a-34: gal te de bzhin dpal bla ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435b-0: mnyes na skad @435b cig gis sdig 'tshig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435b-6: dang por slob dpon dbang gcig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435b-7: gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435b-8: gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435b-9: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435b-12: shes rab ye shes bcu gsum pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:435b-33: rin chen sna tshogs rgyal mtshan mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436a-23: de ltar phyag rgyal bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436a-24: 'di ni dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436a-25: de nas slob ma'i lag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436a-26: byin nas 'di skad smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436a-27: nga yi bka' lung rtog med pas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436a-29: padmo'i snying po'i dbus na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436a-30: rdor dbyings dbang phyug mi ni bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436a-31: de ma rnyed pa'i bar du ni; ;thabs gzhan la ni byang chub med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436a-32: de ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436a-33: phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchod //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436b-0: slob dpon dang slob @436b ma brtag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436b-2: dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436b-3: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436b-4: mchog dang rab mchog mchog gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436b-5: phung po lnga yi bdag nyid sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436b-6: legs dgyes dbang po 'khor lo drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436b-7: zla phyed byad gzugs char yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436b-8: rlung gi 'khor lo'i nang na bzhugs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436b-10: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-013:436b-13: de ni mchog dang gzhan mchog phra //
